document_data.caption: ''A rod of rulership.''
document_data.name: ''Rod of Rulership''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''rod of rulership''''' enabled its wielder to impose his or her will to would-be subjects. They felt a wave of compulsion washing over them, a telepathic call to fall to their knees and obey the wielder. Persons of strong mind could withstand its effect though. The rod appeared as a jeweled scepter wrought of solid gold. It was often favored by chieftains and tribal leaders.
document_data.Powers: These items were even more potent when wielded by the [[dreadmaster]]s of [[Bane]].
